content:
Use authoring actions like edit, publish, and restore to manage articles from the Knowledge home and article record pages. Administrators, agents, and internal employees with the correct profile permissions can perform these actions.

Available in: Lightning Experience

Salesforce Knowledge is available in Essentials and Unlimited Editions with Service Cloud. Salesforce Knowledge is also available for an additional cost in Professional, Enterprise, Performance, and Developer Editions.

Authoring actions appear in Knowledge home and in record pages. In Knowledge list views, including Knowledge home, you can quickly perform record actions that affect one or multiple records. Use bulk actions to update multiple records at once.

In article record pages, you can control which authoring actions are available with page layouts and user permissions. The actions that appear also depend on the article’s publishing status.

You add authoring actions in the page layout editor.

In Lightning Knowledge page layouts, actions are shown or hidden based on the article’s publication status. In Knowledge home, bulk actions appear on all list views for users with the appropriate permission.
title: Authoring Actions in Salesforce Service Cloud
